item.title: 中美人工智能竞争中心的英伟达芯片指南
item.description: 在中国奋力追赶美国人工智能技术之际，硅谷英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）生产的哪些芯片可以运给中国客户，就可以衡量两国关系的状况。【原文：As China races to catch up with the US in artificial intelligence technology, the state of relations between the countries can be gauged by looking at which of the chips made by Silicon Valley’s Nvidia Corp. can be shipped to Chinese customers.】

item.title: 印度小盘股跌跌不休，零售交易商倍感压力
item.description: 印度的小盘股大幅落后于大盘股，对主导该板块交易的散户投资者造成了打击。【原文：India’s small-cap stocks are sharply trailing their larger peers, dealing a blow to retail investors who dominate trading in the segment.】

item.title: 日本股价飙升引发拆股浪潮
item.description: 日本股市今年创下了一个又一个纪录，但个人投资者却很难加入这场狂欢。【原文：Japan’s stock market has notched up record after record this year, but individual investors are having a harder time joining the party.】

item.title: 腾讯出手重塑百亿美元全球游戏帝国
item.description: 今年，腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）的游戏业务凭借僵尸恐怖游戏《致命光线》（Dying Light：The Beast.【原文：This year, Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s gaming business scored record sales, defying an industry slowdown with international hits like zombie horror Dying Light: The Beast.】

item.title: 特朗普称已 "想好 "美联储主席人选
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于本周开始面试美联储主席的几位候选人。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will be looking at a couple candidates to chair the Federal Reserve, after the Financial Times reported that he would begin interviews with contenders this week.】

item.title: 政治局支持流动性，中国收益率曲线有望趋缓
item.description: 在中国最高领导人表示将适度宽松的货币政策作为明年经济工作的重中之重之后，中国的主权收益率曲线似乎将延续近期的陡峭走势。【原文：China’s sovereign yield curve looks set to extend a recent steepening after the nation’s top leaders signaled a moderately loose monetary stance with their top economic priorities for next year.】

item.title: 交易员等待美联储线索，亚洲股市走势低迷：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者在等待美联储今年最后一次利率决议中有关其政策路径的线索，亚洲股市似乎将追随华尔街低迷的盘面。【原文：Asian stocks looked set to track a sluggish session on Wall Street as investors awaited clues on the Federal Reserve’s policy path in its final interest-rate decision of the year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚禁止 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体。如何实施？
item.description: 澳大利亚青少年被禁止使用 Facebook、Instagram 和 TikTok 等社交媒体平台，这是民主世界对数字平台最严厉的打击之一。【原文：Young teenagers in Australia have been barred from social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and TikTok in one of the toughest crackdowns on digital platforms in the democratic world.】

item.title: Argo 在达成被阿波罗收购的交易后，加大了对数据中心的投入
item.description: Argo Infrastructure Partners 今年早些时候同意被阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Argo Infrastructure Partners is ramping up its bet on data centers after agreeing to be acquired by Apollo Global Management Inc. earlier this year.】

item.title: 债券交易员对美联储在 12 月后继续降息表示怀疑
item.description: 债券交易商押注美联储未来一年的降息步伐将放缓，这是全球范围内押注主要央行将放缓或停止宽松货币政策的行动之一。【原文：Bond traders are betting on a shallower path of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in the year ahead, part of a global move to wager that major central banks will slow or halt their monetary easing.】

item.title: 马里奥-加贝里 "有可能 "向派拉蒙出让华纳兄弟股票
item.description: 基金经理马里奥-加贝利（Mario Gabelli）表示，他 "极有可能 "将其客户持有的华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司股票出售给派拉蒙 Skydance 公司，以引发对华纳兄弟的竞购战。【原文：Money manager Mario Gabelli said it’s “highly likely’ he will tender his clients’ Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares to Paramount Skydance Corp. in an effort to spark a bidding war for Warner Bros.】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司提高回购额度，因人工智能技术蓬勃发展而将股息增加一倍
item.description: 在电力需求激增的情况下，美国发电设备制造商通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova）将股息增加了一倍，并扩大了股票回购范围，同时提高了盈利预测。【原文：GE Vernova, the US manufacturer of power generation equipment, doubled its dividend and increased its scope for share buybacks while increasing earnings projections amid soaring demand for electricity.】

item.title: 日本网络主管警告称日本在网络安全方面仍然落后
item.description: 日本新任网络负责人表示，日本在防御网络威胁方面仍然落后于美国和欧洲，整个企业部门都需要改进。【原文：Japan still lags behind the US and Europe in defending against cyber threats and improvements are needed across the corporate sector, the nation’s new cyber chief said.】

item.title: 贷款骤降至 63 美分，First Brands 急忙控制恐慌情绪
item.description: 最近几天，First Brands 集团的主要投资者纷纷抛售这家破产汽车供应商的债务股份，导致其最高级别贷款的价值崩溃，并促使其提前召集贷款人以平息紧张情绪。【原文：Major investors in First Brands Group have offloaded stakes in the bankrupt auto supplier’s debt in recent days, causing the value of its most senior loan to collapse and prompting it to pull forward a lender call to calm nerves.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 HPS 计划推出面向零售业的新 "H 系列 "私募基金
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）在斥资 120 亿美元收购信贷专家 HPS Investment Partners 之后，正计划面向零售投资者推出一系列新的私募市场基金。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is planning to roll out a series of new private markets funds for retail investors following its $12 billion acquisition of credit specialist HPS Investment Partners.】

item.title: 司法部考虑对药房软件合并案提出反垄断质疑
item.description: 随着反垄断执法人员加强对医疗保健行业的关注，美国司法部正在权衡对两家为小型独立药店提供软件的最大公司之间的交易提出质疑。【原文：The US Justice Department is weighing a challenge to a deal between two of the largest companies offering software to small, independent pharmacies, as antitrust enforcers step up their focus on the health-care industry.】

item.title: 华为在人工智能领域的成就刺激了特朗普对 Nvidia H200 的缓和态度
item.description: 据一位熟悉讨论情况的人士称，唐纳德-特朗普总统决定让英伟达公司向中国出售其 H200 人工智能芯片，因为该公司的中国竞争对手华为技术有限公司已经提供了性能相当的人工智能系统，因此此举的安全风险较低。【原文：President Donald Trump decided to let Nvidia Corp. sell its H200 artificial intelligence chips to China after concluding the move carried a lower security risk because the company’s Chinese archrival, Huawei Technologies Co., already offers AI systems with comparable performance, according to a person familiar with the deliberations.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Jana 敦促 Alkami Technology 探索出售事宜
item.description: 激进投资者 Jana Partners 认为，面向银行和信用社的金融科技公司 Alkami Technology Inc.【原文：Alkami Technology Inc., a financial-technology player catering to banks and credit unions, is undervalued and should explore a sale to a rival corporation or private equity player, according to activist investor Jana Partners.】

item.title: Pebble 推出价值 75 美元的人工智能智能戒指，带麦克风可记录笔记
item.description: Pebble 是智能手表的先驱品牌，今年早些时候作为一家新公司的一部分卷土重来。【原文：Pebble, the pioneering smartwatch brand that made a surprise comeback earlier this year as part of a new company, is expanding into a timely new category: smart rings.】

item.title: TPG 准备在全公司范围内开展房地产筹资活动
item.description: TPG 公司正在为其房地产业务大举筹款，因为该公司希望利用这一近年来面临压力的行业。【原文：TPG Inc. is making a big fundraising push for its real estate businesses as it looks to capitalize on a sector that has come under pressure in recent years.】

item.title: 安森推动 SPS Commerce 探索出售和管理层变动
item.description: 安森基金管理公司（Anson Funds Management）已入股 SPS Commerce Inc.【原文：Anson Funds Management has taken a stake in SPS Commerce Inc. and is pushing the maker of retail supply chain management software to consider ousting its chief executive officer and put itself up for sale.】

item.title: CME 数据中心的困境始于开市前 12 小时
item.description: 据彭博社查阅的一份机密报告称，为芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：The owner of the data center that serves CME Group Inc. started experiencing technical problems about 12 hours before an outage in its cooling system took down global markets, according to a confidential report reviewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: OpenAI 聘请 Slack 首席执行官 Denise Dresser 担任首席营收官
item.description: OpenAI 已聘请 Slack 首席执行官 Denise Dresser 担任其首席营收官，因为这家 ChatGPT 制造商正努力扩大其人工智能产品的商业应用。【原文：OpenAI has hired Slack Chief Executive Officer Denise Dresser to be its chief revenue officer as the ChatGPT maker pushes to expand business adoption of its artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 英格鲁和泰克投资者支持创建 500 亿美元矿业公司的交易
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）和泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）的股东投票赞成两家公司合并，为创建一家价值 500 亿美元、专注于智利和秘鲁铜矿的金属生产商迈出了关键一步。【原文：Anglo American Plc and Teck Resources Ltd. shareholders voted in favor of the two companies combining, clearing a key step toward the creation of a $50 billion metals producer focused on copper mines in Chile and Peru.】

item.title: 世界见证首个青少年社交媒体禁令在澳大利亚启动
item.description: 澳大利亚针对青少年的社交媒体禁令于周三生效，这一具有里程碑意义的举措引起了全球关注，因为各国政府正在制定越来越多的规则，以保护未成年人免受有毒内容和网络欺凌的侵害。【原文：Australia’s social media ban for youths took effect Wednesday, a landmark move that’s drawn global attention at a time governments are increasingly enacting rules to shield minors from toxic content and cyberbullying.】

item.title: 尽管预算存疑，法国央行预计年底经济仍将增长
item.description: 法国央行表示，法国第四季度经济将增长0.2%，摆脱了明年是否会有预算的不确定性。【原文：France’s economy is set to expand 0.2% in the fourth quarter, shrugging off uncertainty over whether there’ll be a budget for next year, the central bank said.】

item.title: 关税冲击后增长趋稳，加拿大央行将按兵不动：决策指南
item.description: 越来越多的证据表明，在经历了最初的关税冲击之后，加拿大的劳动力市场和经济正在趋于稳定，因此加拿大央行可能在周三保持利率稳定。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday amid mounting evidence the country’s labor market and economy are stabilizing after the initial tariff shock.】

item.title: 送货英雄在股东寻求战略审查后权衡各种选择
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 表示，在主要股东要求其进行战略审查的压力下，该公司正在评估改善财务和运营的各种方案，包括改变资本结构。【原文：Delivery Hero SE said it’s evaluating options to improve its finances and operations, including changes to its capital structure, after coming under pressure from major shareholders to conduct a strategic review.】

item.title: 欠下 1.93 亿美元公共债务的加州医院申请破产
item.description: 萨克拉门托以北约 70 英里处的一家加利福尼亚医院因未能出售自己或与更大的医院系统达成附属关系，于周一申请破产保护。【原文：A California hospital about 70 miles north of Sacramento filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy Monday after failing to sell itself or secure an affiliation with a larger hospital system.】

item.title: SLB 斥资 3000 万美元扩建数据中心制造厂
item.description: SLB 将投资 3,000 万美元扩大路易斯安那州什里夫波特制造中心的运营，扩大其生产数字和数据中心设备的足迹。【原文：SLB is investing $30 million to expand operations for a manufacturing hub in Shreveport, Louisiana, broadening its footprint for producing digital and data center equipment.】
